description: This Java source file defines a global exception handler for a Spring Boot application. It centralizes the handling of various exceptions, maps them to appropriate HTTP responses, and logs error details via an audit service.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring ControllerAdvice class that handles exceptions globally across controllers, providing standardized error responses and auditing.

methods.name: GlobalExceptionHandler
methods.description: Constructor that injects the AuditService dependency.

methods.name: handleValidation
methods.description: Handles validation errors resulting from method argument validation failures, returning a detailed bad request response.

methods.name: handleConstraint
methods.description: Handles constraint violation exceptions, returning a bad request response.

methods.name: handleNotFound
methods.description: Handles entity not found exceptions with a not found response.

methods.name: handleDataIntegrity
methods.description: Handles data integrity violations with a conflict response.

methods.name: handleTransaction
methods.description: Handles transaction system exceptions with a bad request response.

methods.name: handleGeneric
methods.description: Catches all other exceptions, responding with an internal server error.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the ErrorResponse object with details about the error, logs it via the audit service, and returns an appropriate ResponseEntity.
